statements: UPDATE UserLocationARInformation SET user_name = 'Alice', user_ar_environment = '{"weather": "sunny", "time": "afternoon"}' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserLocationARInformation SET user_location_geo = 'POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)', user_name = 'Bob' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserLocationARInformation SET user_ar_environment = '{"ambient_light": "low", "objects": ["table", "chair"]}' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE UserLocationARInformation SET user_name = 'Alice', user_location_geo = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)') WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE ar_user_locations SET user_location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060) WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_information SET information = 'Updated info' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE ar_user_locations SET user_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.349358 47.620482)', 4326) WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE ar_information SET information = 'Updated information', user_id = 123 WHERE information_id = 456;
UPDATE user_location SET user_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ar_environment SET environment_description = 'Virtual reality environment' WHERE environment_id = 'a12bcfab-6514-4f63-a4d3-8aca3d721a12';
UPDATE user_location SET user_name = 'Alice' WHERE user_id = '58b7d55b-70ff-4c7c-85fa-a47f95e06ce2';
UPDATE ar_environment SET environment_description = 'Outdoor park with virtual animals' WHERE environment_id = 'ffddae92-be6a-4586-92dc-d68872d07399';
UPDATE users SET location='California' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE locations SET latitude=37.7749, longitude=-122.4194 WHERE location_id=2;
UPDATE users SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_ar_objects SET last_viewed = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 2 and object_id = 3;
UPDATE UserLocations SET location_lat = 37.7749 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE ARObjects SET object_location_long = -122.4194, object_location_lat = 37.7749 WHERE object_id = 201;
UPDATE UserLocations SET user_name = 'John Doe', location_lat = 40.7128, location_long = -74.0060 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE ARObjects SET object_description = 'An exciting AR object', object_location_lat = 34.0522, object_location_long = -118.2437, object_name = 'AR Star' WHERE object_id = 456;
